Code Tutorial¶

Environment Setup¶

Create pip environment: python -m venv Melon

Activate Environment: source Melon/bin/activate

Creating an environment using requirements.txt file: pip install -r requirements.txt

Run Application¶

Run $flask run on terminal.

Open browser and run the server.

Data¶

Lyrics - web crawl from https://www.azlyrics.com

Melon
